searchBar.srText: Search the content of the website

limitSources.title: Limit sources
limitSources.toolTip: Enable to select which sources the search will be performed in. If the toggle is in it's off position, the search will be performed in all available sources.

mapLabels.title: Show feature labels
mapLabels.toolTip: If active, a label will be shown in the map next to the highlighted search result.

activeFilter.title: Demand that the whole feature must fit in the search area.
activeFilter.toolTip: If active, the whole feature (for example an estate polygon) must fit within the search area to be shown in the search results. If inactive, only a small part of the polygon must be in the search area to be shown in the search results.

wildcardAtStart.title: Wildcard before
wildcardAtStart.toolTip: If active, a search for 'road' will also return hits on 'big road'.

wildcardAtEnd.title: Wildcard after
wildcardAtEnd.toolTip: If active, a search for 'road' will also return hits on 'road block'.

matchCase.title: Case sensitivity
matchCase.toolTip: If active, a search for 'a' won't match features containing 'A'. Disable to search regardless of lowercase / uppercase.

extentSearch.title: View search
extentSearch.toolTip: Perform a search throughout the current map area.

objectSearch.title: Object search
objectSearch.toolTip: Perform a search by selecting one or more areas in the map.

radiusSearch.title: Radius search
radiusSearch.toolTip: Perform a search in an area by drawing a circle.

polygonSearch.title: Polygon search
polygonSearch.toolTip: Perform a search in an area by drawing a polygon.

layerSwitcher.description: Choose what to show in the map
layerSwitcher.title: Layer manager
